title: New: Chandelier – Decades
body:
With the refined elegance of Lana Del Rey and a Beach House-esque ability to conjure up a dreamy atmosphere that’s simply out of this world, this debut outing from California’s** Chandelier** is wondrous on so many levels.

_Decades_ is sultry yet emotionally revealing, flowering into one of the most impressive tracks of 2014 so far.

Decades is sultry yet emotionally revealing, flowering into one of the most impressive tracks of 2014 so far.
